text: wdet aimra'at aleaziz -brfq wlyn- yusif aldhy hu fi baytiha 'iilaa nfsha; lhbha alshadid lah wahusn bhayh, wghllaqt al'abwab ealayha waealaa ywsf, wqalt: hlmm 'ilya, fqal: maeadh allah aetsm bh, wastjyr min aldhy tdeynny 'ilyh, min khianatan sayidi aladhi 'ahsan mnzlty wakrmny fala akhwnh fi ahlh, 'iinah la yuflih man zalam fafael ma lays lah felh
